(Don't want to freeze this battle, so I'll just keep posting and await 
Rudra's resposne

Zardus: No, you're wrong, don't mock Baron Van Halen.  And currently the 
Alliance Island is under attack by a single robot named Chaostaur, owned by 
Rudra, but Punch is firing several autoguns on him and I am humbly waiting a 
response)

Shockwave/Unitron/Sixshot/Firestarter:



Shockwave did some basic and advanced maneuvers, and there were just to many 
shots as a dozen blasted a gaping hole in his right wing, which a few seconds 
later was ripped off by the wind.  He reverted to biped mode and instantly 
transformed to his ray gun mode.

As big as he was originally, this massive weapon bears upon Windlord, firing 
off a powerful blast of gamma rays.  The Emperor reverted back to robot mode, 
missile launcher in his single hand, his energy resources temporarily drained 
from the demanding shot.

More down towards the ground was Unitron, in his tank mode, not fairing to 
well.  Going at his full speed, he was able to dodge both missiles and all 
but two shots from Aerotaur, but the ice blast from Gemini struck one of the 
extensive armor plates that protected his treads, and a fusion blast tore 
through the now greatly weakened armor there, blasting through the treads.

Unitron came to a dead halt, the Deceptcion warrior in great pain.  He 
swerved his turret, firing off two explosive shells from his large cannon at 
the Maximal tank that had struck him, getting ready to go to an alternate 
mode.  The mounted machine gun on his turret swivelled and fired off ten 
rapid laser bolts at the Gemini who had shot at him. 

Meanwhile, back in the air, the only STAG in existance easily dodged the six 
shots fired at him, coincidentally his name being Sixshot.  He armed a pair 
of missiles, launching them both, each splitting apart, one heading for 
Cledar and the other at Blyer.

And still in the air, for now, was Firestarter, third oldest among the 
current Decepticons present at the battle.  His scanners detected someone 
getting a lock on him and two incoming objects, so he barrel rolled, each 
missile going by but the explosions from the shock wave rattled him a little, 
a piece of shrapnel smashing a small hole through his cockpit and stabbing 
into the empty seat.

"Lousy Autobots." he cursed, bringing his laser weaponry to full and 
launching off twenty rapid laser bolts down at Hot Rod.
